talk.title: Did You Know You Could..? Series: Represent languages geometrically as clouds of points?
talk.publisher: Hariri Institute for Computing, Boston University, 2020

talk.title: Bilingual lexicon induction using related language
talk.publisher: Hariri Institute for Computing, Boston University, 2018

talk.title: Virtual Public Lecture Natural Language Processing (NLP) Research at Boston University

media.title: Aiming to Learn as We Do, a Machine Teaches Itself
media.text: Give a computer a task that can be crisply defined, win at chess, predict the weather, and the machine bests humans nearly every time. Yet when problems are nuanced or ambiguous, or require combining varied sources of information, computers are no match for human intelligence
media.publisher: The New York Times, by Steve Lohr, October 5, 2010

media.title: What If You Could Manage Information Overload?
media.text: Groundbreaking collaboration among BU schools and researchers leads to $1 million NSF grant to address media overload.
